name: Mix requests table
description: A table that demonstrate how to combine multiple remote resources

options.title: US population over the year and pokemon data
options.rows: <${ const pokemonRows=this.remoteResourcesStates?.results?.["POKEMON_PARALLEL.REMOTE_RESOURCE"]?.result?.map((({id:id,name:name,height:height,weight:weight,types:types})=>({id:id,name:name,height:height,weight:weight,types:types.map((typeObj=>typeObj.type.name)).join(", ")})))??[];const usPopulationRows=this.remoteResourcesStates?.results?.["US_POP_PAGINATION.REMOTE_RESOURCE"]?.result?.map((({State:state,Year:year,Population:population})=>({state:state,year:year,population:population})))??[];const missingPokemonRow={id:"No data",name:"No data",height:"No data",weight:"No data",types:"No data"};let combinedRows=usPopulationRows.map(((usPopRow,idx)=>{const matchingPokemonRow=pokemonRows[idx];if(matchingPokemonRow){return{...usPopRow,...matchingPokemonRow}}return{...usPopRow,...missingPokemonRow}}));return combinedRows; }$>
